thread.title: Brave Susanna Reid shares make-up free selfie without filters to show stark contrast
thread.title_full: Brave Susanna Reid shares make-up free selfie without filters to show stark contrast

author: Claire Rutter
title: Brave Susanna Reid shares make-up free selfie without filters to show stark contrast
text:
Get celebs updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Instagram and its filters is renowned for making its users look better and it's not often, unless it's for charity, that we see celebrities go make-up free. 
Most of the time, celebs look as if they've got their glam squad on speed dial before they dare post a selfie on to the social media platform, but that's not the case for Susanna Reid. 
The Good Morning Britain star made a powerful and inspiring statement for her fans on Monday as she kicked off the new year by posting a before-and-after selfie – one with make-up and one without. 
Susanna, 46, who will be returning to GMB after a Christmas break, shared the two pictures along with the message: “[Right] Me on Instagram = extra eyelashes, make-up & filters. [Left] Me in Real life = blemishes, lines & flaws.” Susannah Reid make-up free selfie (Photo: Instagram @susannareid100) 
She continued: “There's a time & value for both but don't compare your behind-the-scenes to others' highlights reels. Happy Being You Year!” 
It didn't take long for Susanna's Instagram post to become flooded with positive messages. 
Her message comes after she recently clashed with her co-host Piers Morgan on the morning TV show over the subject of ageing, where he said it should be “resisted at all costs”. Susanna Reid and Piers Morgan on Good Morning Britain (Photo: ITV) 
Susanna declared that she felt “every inch” of her 46 years and described it as a “blessing”. 
"Age is to be welcomed and a blessing,” the mother-of-three said. 
"It is a good thing to get older, isn't it? Consider the alternative…" 
Piers was adamant that ageing should be considered “a curse” and that noone actually wanted to get older. 
His intelligent co-hosts pointed out that he didn't have much choice in the matter so probably wasn't much point in resisting it. Like us on Facebook
